data.title: What is GoMovies? 20+ GoMovies Alternatives to Try! (Free
data.meta_description: Check best GoMovies alternatives - Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Disney+, Apple TV+, Paramount+, JW Player and more...
data.text:
Exclusive Features of GoMovies

GoMovies offers an array of features that enhance the streaming experience for its users:

GoMovies has an extensive range of movies and shows, ranging from the latest blockbusters to timeless classics.

GoMovies guarantees flawless streaming with zero buffering and top-notch audio and video quality.

Thanks to its user-friendly design, users may effortlessly navigate and explore the extensive movie catalog on the platform. You may quickly locate the movies you wish to watch with a few clicks.

With the several streaming options GoMovies provides, you can select the server and video quality you want.

On GoMovies, language boundaries are not a problem. The portal guarantees you can watch movies worldwide by offering subtitles in multiple languages.

Users of GoMovies can bookmark their favorite films and make custom playlists.

Top 20 GoMovies Alternatives Websites to Watch Movies or Videos

Are you looking for alternatives to GoMovies for watching movies and videos? With the popularity of GoMovies, many viewers seek trusted and legal platforms offering a seamless streaming experience. This list highlights the top 20 websites where you can enjoy an excellent range of movies and videos.

Amazon Prime Video

With its renowned Prime service, Amazon delivers goods to your home, typically in a day or less. On the other hand, they grant users access to their over-the-top streaming service.

Since the 2007 Prime debut, Amazon has followed Netflix’s lead and created original content exclusively accessible through their over-the-top (OTT) service. As a result, Prime Video now offers thousands of movies and episodes.

More than 150 million people are Amazon subscribers. On Amazon, international content is readily available. Many excellent Amazon original series, such as Homecoming, Forever, and The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel, are available.

Netflix

Even though this company began as a DVD rental service, this is probably the first name that comes to mind when we ask you to think of a streaming service.

Having existed since the days of Blockbuster, Netflix’s rise to fame can be attributed to its investments in over-the-top (OTT) streaming technologies. The company has one of the best content collections, with more than 2,500 episodes and more than 5000 films in almost every genre. It provides in-house produced unique titles as well, which draws a lot of users to the service. These have included movies like Money Heist, Stranger Things, Squid Game, and The Crown.

There are 692 million Netflix subscribers globally, up 6% from the previous year; by 2024, that number is expected to rise to 725 million. Thus, it’s evident that their marketing approach has been convenient!

Hulu

Launched in 2017 and owned by The Walt Disney Company, Hulu is a popular streaming service and is considered the best alternative to GoMovies. Popular TV series are streamed on Hulu, an on-demand video service accessible in the US, Puerto Rico, and Japan.

To utilize Hulu, there are no long-term obligations or contracts to sign, unlike with traditional TV. Even better, Hulu offers a seven-day free trial during which you can discontinue the service without paying anything. However, you must still provide credit card information when you sign up.

HBO

HBO, an American television network, developed an internet video streaming service called Max. The platform, which debuted in the United States in 2020, is well-known for its original programming, which includes well-known dramas and comedies. In May 2023, the platform amalgamated with Discovery+, a non-fiction streaming service, and adopted the moniker “Max.”

Max has not yet been launched in India despite being available in Sweden, Norway, Andorra, Denmark, and Spain. Indian citizens can still use a VPN to access the entire Max repertoire and view some of HBO’s blockbuster series abroad.

Max provides a wealth of content-rich, high-end streaming that is well worth the price. Max offers something for everyone, whether your tastes are in original programs, kid-friendly programming, or exclusive films.

Vidics

Vidics is another excellent alternative to GoMovies, allowing users to enjoy exciting content for free. Not only does the platform give unlimited access to shows and movies from a particular region, but it also lets users enjoy movies across the globe. Using the intelligent search feature, users can search for the movie or show they want to enjoy.

Unlike other platforms, Vidics also offers a “schedule” tab, which lists movies and TV shows uploaded daily. In addition to that, along with movies and shows, the platform also offers a short description of the particular film and represents the reviews it gets from the people.

However, the minus point of this platform is the language barrier. The platform cannot translate all shows and movies into the user’s regional language. This website seems to undergo constant modifications to the service it offers to users.

Disney+

Disney+ is well known for its National Geographic documentaries and collection of Disney classics. It ensures an excellent visual experience. Up to 4K Ultra HD quality is available for streaming. The audio and visual quality of the streaming service are outstanding.

Disney+ is ad-free and offers continuous access to its vast collection. To access its extensive material repository, users must first register an account. Subscribers can choose from various paid plans for package deals with Hulu and ESPN+. The interesting fact about this platform is that it offers the ability to download content on mobile devices and enjoy it offline.

Peacock

NBC Universal’s high-end video streaming service is known as Peacock. The media company, which Comcast owns, launched the service in the middle of 2020. It includes films from Universal Pictures, Dreamworks Animation, and Focus Features, as well as modern and vintage NBC Universal broadcast and cable network series.

Peacock also provides a selection of unique new TV series and films accessible only via the service. Reboots of classic shows like Saved by the Bell and Punky Brewster coexist alongside new shows like Girls5Eva.

Having said that, as of the end of July 2021, Peacock boasted a member base of over 54 million. In May 2021, the Wall Street Journal reported that roughly 10 million users pay for the service.

The Roku Channel

Another completely free GoMovies alternative to enjoy TV shows and movies is the Roku Channel. The significant advantage of this platform is that it keeps updating its collection regularly. Many users consider Roku a free alternative to popular streaming providers such as Netflix and Prime Video.

The interface of the platform is user-centric. However, you have to deal with ads, but it’s not that much disturbing. Along with free content from already-existing Roku platforms like Popcornflix and FilmRise, you will also have the opportunity to watch films from Roku partners like MGM, Lionsgate, Sony, and Warner.

Unlike other GoMovies substitutes, this streaming service is accessible in the US, Mexico, and the UK.

BBC iPlayer

Launched in 2007 as the British Broadcasting Service, BBC iPlayer offers a wide selection of classic, sci-fi, and even some unknown but exciting shows. The streaming service provides all the broadcaster’s programming on demand to TV license-paying residents in the UK. Viewers can choose from over 2000 hours of premium quality programming.

More than just a streaming service, the platform allows viewers to catch up on any programs shown on BBC TV channels from the past 30 days. The service is free for all UK residents who pay for a TV license. The license cost is £159 a year.

Tubi

Tubi is a popular and free alternative to GoMovies. Tubi enjoys a vast user base and an extensive library of genres such as comedy, drama, anime, thriller, and more. The content on the Tubi platform is regularly updated, ensuring there is always something interesting to watch, from retro and classic shows to trending movies.

Tubi works on the ad-supported model, meaning the content is free, but users must watch ads between the shows. Tubi can be accessed on various devices, such as mobile, tablet, and SmartTV. This flexibility ensures users can enjoy Tubi’s content on their preferred screen.

If users want to access ad-free content, they can opt for the subscription plans that are available to them.

Apple TV+

Apple Inc. launched Apple TV+, a subscription-based streaming service with a wide selection of unique content, including TV series, films, documentaries, and more. Apple TV+ was introduced as part of the company’s push into the streaming market to offer customers direct access to premium content across multiple platforms.

Apple TV+ is an over-the-top (OTT) streaming service, which means customers can watch its content online without a cable subscription, unlike traditional cable or satellite TV. A growing collection of original productions that appeal to various audiences and genres may be found on the site.

Paramount+

With its major rivals, the Paramount service is still catching up. The testers found that the content selection was mediocre in number and quality. Paramount + is not that famous compared to other OTT platforms, but it offers exclusive access to the original content and enables users to download it to view it offline.

Vimeo

Vimeo OTT is a platform for streaming video services. It assists broadcasters and content producers in launching a website and video subscription channel by giving them the tools and assistance they require to grow their viewership.

A paid end-to-end solution that enables you to start a subscription service and channel is Vimeo over-the-top (OTT). Desire to offer video material tailored just for your users and acquire the resources required to oversee, advertise, and make money from it? That’s where Vimeo OTT comes in.

You can add your branding to your channel, update it frequently with fresh content, and use analytics tools to track the growth of your subscriber base over time.

Kaltura

Kaltura Inc. is a provider of streaming platforms in New York City. The corporation provides OTT platforms under the same brand name. Users who want to create high-quality videos can upload, edit, manage, and stream them on Kaltura OTT. It facilitates streaming videos both in real-time and on demand.

Kaltura provides easy-to-integrate video hosting, transcoding, and delivery solutions into various digital media platforms. Kaltura uses adaptive bitrate streaming technology to overcome erratic connections and give a fluid watching experience (independent of their device or internet connection speed).

Kaltura offers many customization choices, from branding options to monitoring dashboard activities and other UI elements, all of which users can modify in real-time.

Vidyard

Vidyard is another of the best GoMovies alternatives, developed for businesses to market and sell products and services. Unlike other platforms we have reviewed above, Vidyard is not about streaming only. Still, the platform also helps businesses reach the right prospects, tell better stories, and attract customers with the help of AI-powered messaging.

So, it can also be considered as video marketing. The platform has various tools and features to maximize audience reach and engagement. These features and functionalities, in turn, help businesses generate leads, from video hosting to video analytics to API access for integration with other devices. The platform can best fit businesses across various sectors, including marketing, sales, and customer engagement.

VdoCipher

Most video streaming products fall into one of several main categories. The first kind assists you in creating and launching OTT platforms that are fully customizable. The second one allows you to host and stream videos online without making OTT platforms.

VdoCipher is a second-class platform. It is a platform for hosting videos designed to assist companies in streaming their video content. But the main goal here is to prevent movie piracy using technologies like dynamic watermarking, AES encryption, screen capture blocking, and unbreakable multi-DRM.

Because VdoCipher’s encoding is tailored for lower-resolution videos, it provides a seamless video stream even on poor network connections for companies and content producers searching for a secure, reliable, and seamless video hosting service.

JW Player

JW Player is a comprehensive video library and monetization platform trusted by over 10,000 brands. JW offers these brands a way to accelerate and upscale their video strategy. Its platform can stream video, engage the audience on any screen, and monetize quality content.

Launched in 2004, JWP is one of the fastest-growing SaaS companies across the globe, and it continues to enhance its video marketing strategy with the best tools and features. JW player is disruptive in the field, offering high-end features at cost-effective rates while allowing users to leverage emerging features.

SolarMovie

SolarMovie offers multiple movies and TV shows based on user preferences. The platform boasts an extensive library of the latest releases and classic films. On SolarMovie, users may enjoy high-quality movie streaming with many HD titles. With its ad presence, it guarantees an engaging viewing experience.

The website lessens playback interruptions, which improves user experience. It gets fresh content updates regularly. Soon after their release, users can watch the newest films and TV shows.

Putlocker

Being a well-known name among cinema enthusiasts, Putlocker is one of the best video sites that does not charge any fee or subscription for streaming. The website launched for the first time in the UK in 2010-2011; Putlocker gained immense popularity quickly. Putlocker was one of the top-ranked websites globally, and as per Alexa, it was one of the top 250 OTT platforms. Unfortunately, UK authorities banned the website because of copyright issues.

EuroPixHD

EuroPixHD is a genuine alternative to the GoMovies website, which can be considered for free watching movies and shows online. Not only does this platform give you unlimited access to film, but it also lets you watch movies from all over the globe. The platform contains tags by category, or you can use the mouse to scroll down the homepage.

The website is continually developed and updated, and a new web page has been designed to expand the variety and make it easier for users to navigate. You may discover what you’re searching for here, whether it’s the newest film or television series. You may now enjoy the show without having to wait any longer. Due to the variety of genres it offers, EuroPixHD is a well-liked, frequently used website.
